Ingredients.7: 1 tablespoon butter, divided, or more as needed

Ingredients.8: 6 (1 inch) thick slices dry brioche bread

Ingredients.10: 6 tablespoons maple syrup, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Whisk milk, eggs, vanilla, sugar, nutmeg, and salt together in a bowl.

Directions.3: Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons butter in a skillet over medium heat. Working in batches, dip each slice of brioche bread in the egg mixture and cook in the hot butter until golden, 2 to 3 minutes per side, adding more butter as needed. Transfer French toast to a baking sheet.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until puffed, 8 to 10 minutes.

Directions.5: Cook and stir 1/4 cup butter in a skillet over medium-low heat until browned and toasty, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer browned butter to a cold dish. Drizzle browned butter over baked French toast and top each slice with 1 tablespoon maple syrup.
